text:
Young people with #coronavirus are dying from strokes.

As a neurologist began the procedure to remove the clot, he observed something he had never seen before. As he used a device to pull out the clot, he saw new clots forming in real-time around it.

https://t.co/9FLGc6PmQ7

urls.title: Young and middle-aged people, barely sick with covid-19, are dying of strokes
urls.description: Doctors sound alarm about patients in their 30s and 40s left debilitated or dead by strokes. Some didn’t even know they were infected by coronavirus.
